summary: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.
cast: Chris Pine|Alec Baldwin|Jude Law|Isla Fisher|Hugh Jackman|Dakota Goyo|Khamani Griffin|Kamil McFadden|Georgie Grieve|Emily Nordwind|Jacob Bertrand|Olivia Mattingly|Dominique Grund|Ryan Crego|April Lawrence|Peter Ramsey|Isabella Blake-Thomas|Stuart Allan|Rich Dietl|Jessica Belkin|Daniel Hahn|Tommy Morgenstern
keywords: santa claus character|the easter bunny character|abominable snowman character|close up of eye|brother sister relationship
title: El origen de los guardianes
